features.desc: Add Thermal Expansion crucible recipe for XP shard -> Essence Of Knowledge
Added The Intern, which will build your factory for you
Added BloodMagic ritual support for crystal growth

fixes.desc: Filter out duplicate death messages from Ender Dragon
Add some Erebus compatibility with custom drops
Fix generation of the EnderIO Enderman skull
Set correct slime size for Pink Slime from Industrial Foregoing
Fix setSlimeSize method being int, bool - and I never noticed
Fix Headhunter enchant being processed incorrectly

fixes.desc:: Fix BloodMagic and EvilCraft upgrades being almost power free

fixes.desc: Only add BloodMagic/EvilCraft generators when the mods are loaded

features.desc: Added two Blood Magic rituals for Life Essence generation
Modify gui display of skulls when using the decapitate upgrades
Allow clear of Ender Shards in crafting table
Added support for recipes up to Long.MAX_VALUE total, Integer.MAX_VALUE per tick
Add a changelog to the manual
Add missing ingredients indicator to gui

fixes.desc: Fixed processing finish issues with very large power usage
Respect stack size when generating items from the anvil
Fix missing sneak-click consume xp shard stack feature
